abstract: Stock prices drop as oil prices hit lowest level in more than four months.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell in the United States as the price of crude oil dropped and Tyson Foods cut its earnings outlook.

headline.main: Wall St. Declines as Price of Crude Oil Falls
headline.print_headline: Another Bad Day for Energy Shares Takes a Toll on the Markets

snippet: Stocks fell in the United States as the price of crude oil dropped and Tyson Foods cut its earnings outlook.
